articles.summary: OpenAI is the world's most valuable startup, valued at $500 billion. The company behind ChatGPT has stitched together chip supply at an unprecedented scale and widened its cloud footprint. OpenAI signed a letter of intent with Nvidia to deploy at least 10 gigawatts of Nvidia systems for its next-gen infrastructure.

articles.title: Sam Altman greenlights erotica for ChatGPT — months after boasting he didn't add a ‘sex bot'
articles.author: Ariel Zilber
articles.summary: OpenAI boss Sam Altman announced on Tuesday that ChatGPT will soon be allowed to engage in erotic chats with adults. Mark Cuban, the tech billionaire and former owner of the Dallas Mavericks, criticized this week's decision, saying it was going to backfire. OpenAI has faced scrutiny over its product's impact on minors and has been hit with lawsuits from parents who allege that chatbot offered harmful or suicidal guidance to teens.

articles.title: Sam Altman To Bring Erotica To ChatGPT In December
articles.author: Emma Roth via The Verge
articles.summary: OpenAI will allow 'erotica' for ChatGPT users who verify their age on the platform. The company will also launch a new version of chatbot GPT-4o to be more user-friendly. OpenAI also announced the formation of a council on 'well-being and AI' to help shape the company's response to sensitive scenarios.

articles.title: China builds humanoid robot with realistic eye movements, bionic skin
articles.author: Prabhat Ranjan Mishra
articles.summary: Elf V1 is an advanced bionic humanoid robot developed by AheadForm Technology. It is powered by a precise control system and an advanced AI learning algorithm. It can perceive the world, communicate, learn, and interact intelligently with its surroundings. It offers up to 30 degrees of freedom.

articles.title: A stapler that knows when you need it: Using AI to turn everyday objects into proactive assistants
articles.author: Mallory Lindahl
articles.summary: Carnegie Mellon University's Human-Computer Interaction Institute uses AI and robotic mobility to turn everyday objects into proactive personal assistants. The team's work on unobtrusive physical AI was presented at the 2025 ACM Symposium on User Interface Software and Technology in Busan, Korea.

articles.title: Proposal to Ban Ai Software that 'Manipulates Human Cognition'
articles.author: Thanh Niên
articles.summary: Draft proposes to ban the development, supply, and marketing of AI software that 'intentionally manipulates human cognition and behavior' and to ban all AI software developed for this purpose. It also proposes a ban on the development and supply of such AI software for humans.

articles.title: Jim Cramer on Southern Company: 'You Gotta Take Some Southern off the Table'
articles.author: Syeda Seirut Javed
articles.summary: The Southern Company (NYSE:SO) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer's radar. The company produces and supplies electricity and natural gas, manages energy infrastructure and develops renewable projects, microgrids, and digital network solutions. The stock hasn't shot up this much since it was Commonwealth & Southern in the 30s.

articles.title: Cantor Fitzgerald Raises PT for Analog Devices (ADI), Keeps Overweight Rating
articles.author: Ali Ahmed
articles.summary: Analog Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:ADI) is one of the 11 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Invest In. Cantor Fitzgerald increased its price target on ADI from $270 to $300 and maintained an Overweight rating. ADI is an American multinational semiconductor company that designs and manufactures analog, mixed signal and digital signal processing integrated circuits.

articles.title: AMD Partners with OpenAI, Goldman Keeps Neutral Rating
articles.author: Ali Ahmed
articles.summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (NASDAQ:AMD) is one of the 11 Best American Semiconductor Stocks to Invest In. Goldman Sachs kept its price target of $210 and Neutral rating on AMD. AMD announced a strategic partnership with OpenAI, which involves OpenAI deploying 6 gigawatts of AMD GPUs over the coming years. The deal includes performance-based warrants, which will allow OpenAI to own up to 160 million shares of AMD.

articles.title: New insights on AI and news
articles.summary: Bob Sillick takes a look at newsrooms that are leaning into AI and how they are using it as a tool. The Poynter Institut is one of the newsrooms using AI to improve its quality of content and improve quality of its content.

articles.title: OpenAI has 5 years to pull off the impossible — turn $13 billion into $1 ...
articles.author: The Economic Times
articles.summary: OpenAI is earning big money from ChatGPT but has bigger plans ahead. The company aims to turn chatbots into intelligent chatbots.   It plans to create a chatbot called OpenAI Chatbot that can talk to any chatbot at any time.

articles.title: AI in CSR Platforms: From System of Record to System of Action
articles.summary: Ian Goldsmith is Chief AI Officer at Benevity. He believes responsible AI has the power to unlock the potential of purpose-driven programs. Benevity will launch its first AI-powered solution for CSR in November. The report shows that more than half of companies expect grant budgets to rise this year.

articles.title: Japan wants OpenAI to stop ripping off manga and anime
articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.summary: Japan's government has asked OpenAI to stop ripping off Japanese artwork. The company has been in copyright hell since the launch of its social video app, which users filled with questionable AI-generated material. CEO Sam Altman has acknowledged OpenAI's debt to 'the remarkable creative output of Japan'.

articles.title: Japan wants OpenAI to stop ripping off manga and anime
articles.author: Robert Hart
articles.summary: Japan's government is asking OpenAI to stop ripping off Japanese artwork. The company has been in copyright hell after the launch of its social video app, which users filled with questionable AI-generated material. CEO Sam Altman has acknowledged OpenAI's debt to 'the remarkable creative output of Japan'

articles.title: Procore Advances the Future of Construction with New AI Innovations at Groundbreak 2025
articles.summary: Procore Technologies, Inc. (NYSE: PCOR) unveiled new AI capabilities built directly into its intelligence layer, Procore Helix. Procore Assist is a conversational AI assistant that provides contextually relevant answers on-demand. Agent Builder allows customers to create custom AI agents to meet the unique needs of their business.

articles.title: KAYAK INTRODUCES AI MODE: CONVERSATIONAL TRAVEL SEARCH, JUST IN TIME FOR HOLIDAY PLANNING
articles.author: KAYAK
articles.summary: KAYAK, the world's leading travel search engine, has launched AI Mode, a natural-language search experience that combines KAYAK's data with ChatGPT to deliver smarter, contextual results. KayAK is the first major travel site to let users plan complete trips by typing questions directly into a search box.

articles.title: AI Bubble May Pop — Wiping Out $40 Trillion. Learn What Could Happen And What ...
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Will today's AI bubble wipe $40 trillion off the Nasdaq? The AI bubble has hallmarks of the dot-com boom. See three scenarios and how to know which one is the most likely one.   Â      .

articles.title: It's Time To Change The Narrative On Sustainability Through Integrated Reporting 2.0
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: AI can determine how well a company is discussing SASB's material issues in risk factors in the 10-K, as well as map to a line item in the financial statement, according to the company's report. It can also be used to assess a company's business strategy.

articles.title: Americans lead the world in AI anxiety
articles.author: Megan Morrone
articles.summary: Americans are more concerned than excited about the rise of artificial intelligence. Italy is the second most concerned country, followed by South Korea and India. Men and highly educated people are more aware of AI and more likely to be excited about it. Women, older adults and those with less education express more concern. Heavy internet users are more enthusiastic.

articles.title: Why 95% Of AI Projects Fail And How Better Data Can Change That
articles.author: Gary Drenik
articles.summary: Up to 95% of AI projects fail to deliver on their promises due to poor data quality. Exponential Technologies has developed a CPI forecast analytic that consistently predicts government inflation reports 23 days in advance since 2022. The technology is racing forward but without accurate, representative, and well-governed data delivered through modern infrastructure, most projects will fail.

articles.title: How Does Artificial Intelligence Shape Children's Learning?
articles.author: falter.at
articles.summary: AI for children is what parents and children need to pay attention to. Bettina Kuschey is a consultant for cooperation, digital competence & communication in schools & companies and our AIWI expert. She is also an expert on AIWI technology for children.

articles.title: Bitdeer (BTDR) Accelerates AI Pivot
articles.author: Coin Desk
articles.summary: The firm sees a "sustained imbalance" between demand and supply of AI computing power. It is projected to generate up to $2 billion annually from AI operations by 2020, according to the firm's estimates.      Â

articles.title: ‘It's About to Go Up By a Billion Times': Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang Says the Next ‘Industrial Revolution' Is Already Here
articles.author: Caleb Naysmith
articles.summary: Jensen Huang is the CEO of NVIDIA (NVDAV), the world's most valuable semiconductor company and a linchpin of the AI economy. His company's chips power nearly every major AI system, from OpenAI's ChatGPT to Amazon's (AMZN) and Meta's (META) data centers. Huang's company's success has turned him into one of the most influential figures in technology.

articles.title: AI awareness around the world
articles.author: Jacob Poushter
articles.summary: A median of 34% of adults across 25 countries say they have heard or read a lot about artificial intelligence. In France, 52% report a high level of awareness, compared with 30% in Spain. Internet use is related to AI awareness. In most surveyed countries, adults under 35 are more likely than those ages 50 and older to have heard about AI. In Hungary, 49% of men and 27% of women have heard a lot. In the U.S., GDP per capita is about $86,000. In Kenya, it's about $2,200.

articles.title: How People Around the World View AI
articles.author: Jacob Poushter
articles.summary: Pew Research Center analysis focuses on public opinion of artificial intelligence in 25 countries across the Asia-Pacific region, Europe, Latin America, the Middle East-North Africa region, North America and sub-Saharan Africa. The report also explores respondents' trust in their own country, the European Union, the United States and China to regulate the use of AI. For non-U.S. data, it draws on nationally representative surveys of 28,333 adults conducted from Jan. 8 to April 26, 2025.

articles.title: Jamie Dimon says AI isn't a bubble — but some projects may not work out
articles.summary: JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon was asked about AI being a bubble at a conference. He said he wasn't concerned, but some projects won't pan out as expected. AI investments account for 40% of GDP growth and such companies made up 80% of US stock gains this year.

articles.title: Cisco AI Readiness Index highlights leaders in AI adoption and infrastructure
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Cisco released its third annual Cisco AI Readiness Index. The study surveyed over 8,000 AI leaders across 30 markets and 26 industries, including India. A small group of companies called 'Pacesetters' are outperforming peers in adopting artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Over 60% of CEOs identify AI as top investment priority
articles.author: RTE
articles.summary: 60% of Irish CEOs have identified artificial intelligence as a top investment priority. Irish business leaders remain optimistic about the future of their organisations, but they are realistic about the wider pressures shaping the economy. They remain optimistic that Ireland is well placed to take advantage of major drivers of growth and opportunity in areas such as tech and AI, low carbon energy solutions and life sciences.

articles.title: Riverbed Study: Saudi Spend on AI Initiatives Surges to Around 160% Year-on-Year as Enterprises Strategically Transforming IT Operations in the Kingdom
articles.author: Eye
articles.summary: Saudi organisations are investing heavily in artificial intelligence (AI) and achieving results that position the Kingdom as one of the most advanced markets among seven countries, according to new research by Riverbed, the leader in AIOps for observability. Riverbed Global Survey 2025: The Future of IT Operations in the AI is titled "Saudi Arabia is one the most exciting AI markets in the world right now".

articles.title: Why AI is now a useful tool in the classroom
articles.author: Jenna Meissner
articles.summary: Shai Rashef is an education expert. He believes that AI has changed from a nuisance in the classroom to a useful tool. AI helps professors create the courses, improve them and upgrade them all the time. AI enables them to create a personalized learning path.

articles.title: Celonis Will Unveil How to Make Enterprise AI Work at Celosphere 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Celonis announced the agenda for Celosphere 2025, taking place November 4-5 in Munich, Germany. This year's program will spotlight the latest in Process Intelligence innovations and tangible, real-world examples to help companies make AI work for their organizations.

articles.title: Celonis Will Unveil How to Make Enterprise AI Work at Celosphere 2025
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Celosphere 2025 is the world's premier Process Intelligence event, taking place November 4-5, 2025 in Munich, Germany. It will bring together more than 3,500 business and technology leaders from around the world for two days of keynotes, AI workshops, product deep dives, panel discussions and live demonstrations. The agenda features leading changemakers from organizations including ARM, Barclays, BMW, British American Tobacco, Cisco, Cosentino, Deutsche Telekom, DHL Group, Mercedes-Benz Group AG, Mondelez, Novartis, Olympus, Renault, Scania, State of Oklahoma, Uniper, Vinmar and Virgin Media.

articles.title: Pennsylvania unveils AI and energy innovation roadmap
articles.author: Rebekah Mcclelland
articles.summary: New 10-year roadmap integrates AI, energy, and data center growth. Plan proposes up to five innovation corridors across Pennsylvania. Goals include modernizing the grid and adding 12 gigawatts of capacity. Roadmap unites business, labor, and government under Team Pennsylvania.

articles.title: This novel asks: What's left of our creativity in the age of AI?
articles.author: Anjan Sundaram
articles.summary: Ken Liu's novel All That We See or Seem is a novel about art and the self in the age of artificial intelligence. It's about the hunt for a disappeared artist named Elli and a hacker named Julia Z. Julia is a ghost in the machine and in her search for Elli, we sense she also hunts for a piece of herself.

articles.title: HeySanta is a terrifying, twerking AI robot
articles.author: Gail Sherman
articles.summary: HeySanta is an AI-powered Santa robot with a huge butt. He tells jokes and sings Christmas carols using generative AI and is programmable via block coding. He has already met his funding goal on Kickstarter and will ship in November. Pledges start at $69.

articles.title: OpenAI partners with Walmart to let users buy products in ChatGPT
articles.author: Charles Krupa
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with Walmart to let shoppers make purchases directly within ChatGPT. The new offering will give customers the option to "simply chat and buy" Walmart's products will be available through instant checkout. OpenAI recently launched similar offerings for Shopify and Etsy sellers.

articles.title: OpenAI partners with Walmart to let users buy products in ChatGPT
articles.author: Wyatte Grantham-Philips
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with Walmart to let shoppers make purchases directly within ChatGPT. The new offering will give customers the option to "simply chat and buy" Walmart's products will be available through instant checkout. OpenAI hasn't made a profit and relied on investors to back the costs of building its powerful AI systems.

articles.title: OpenAI partners with Walmart to let users buy products in ChatGPT
articles.author: Benzinga
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with Walmart to let shoppers make purchases directly within ChatGPT. The new offering will give customers the option to "simply chat and buy" Walmart's products will be available through instant checkout. The partnership marks OpenAI's latest expansion into online commerce.

articles.title: Walmart stock is at record highs after ChatGPT shopping deal
articles.author: Max Adams
articles.summary: Walmart shares rose almost 1% on Wednesday after closing Tuesday's session at an all-time high of $107.21. The stock is getting a boost from a partnership with OpenAI for online shopping. It's another example in OpenAI's growing web of partnerships that span vast swaths of industry and commerce.

articles.title: For second time, Gov. Polis convenes group to rewrite Colorado's AI regulations
articles.author: Daily Camera
articles.summary: A working group of technology companies and consumer advocates will meet to try to reach a consensus on regulating artificial intelligence. It's the second time in a little more than a year that the group has met. The working group will seek to rewrite the state's law.

articles.title: Pomona College Reduces Food Waste and Achieves More Than 500% ROI with Metafoodx AI Scanner
articles.author: Metafoodx
articles.summary: Pomona College has successfully transformed its dining operations using the Metafoodx AI Scanner. The AI-powered platform is designed to cut food waste and boost efficiency in commercial kitchens. Pomona College is ranked among the top colleges for campus dining in California.

articles.title: Boyd Recognized for Commissioning Service Excellence by Liquid Cooled Data Center Pioneers
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Boyd's field service team was recently recognized for outstanding service in one of the largest and earliest AI factory deployments in an over 250MW liquid cooled data center. The client, who is a leading colocation service provider, has requested to remain confidential. Boyd makes it easier for data center owners and operators to implement new Artificial Intelligence (AI) infrastructure.

articles.title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos says ‘millions of people' will be living in space by 2045—and robots will commute on our behalf to the moon
articles.author: Orianna Rosa Royle
articles.summary: Jeff Bezos is optimistic about the future of technology. He predicts that by 2045, people will be living in space and working on other planets. Sam Altman and Elon Musk have also shared similar predictions. Bill Gates thinks people should focus more on Earth and less on space exploration.

articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Stocks Continue Surge, With BlackRock, Nvidia, Microsoft Joining in $40B AI Data Center Bet
articles.author: Helene Braun
articles.summary: A consortium made up of BlackRock, Nvidia, xAI, Microsoft and others will acquire Aligned Data Centers in a $40 billion deal. Aligned designs and operates data centers for clients including hyperscalers, enterprise firms and newer cloud providers. It controls 50 campuses across the U.S. and Latin America with more than 5 gigawatts of operating and planned capacity, including properties still under development.

articles.title: She looks real. She acts human. But Tilly Norwood isn't either, and she has Hollywood on edge.
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: The AI-generated star is turning heads and it's turning heads.   Â. Â  ii. ii ii, ii and ii are talking about the AI- generated star, which is a star made by AI.

articles.title: Stealth breast cancer that hides from scans targeted in breakthrough tech
articles.author: Fox News
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is making its mark on the future of cancer care. One of the newest applications for the technology is pinpointing hard-to-detect breast cancer. Researchers at The Ohio State University Comprehensive Cancer Center – Arthur G. James Cancer Hospital and Richard J. Solove Research Institute are working on the project.

articles.title: ChatGPT To Get More 'Human‑Like' Mode, Will Launch Erotica For Verified Adults
articles.author: Joe Lombardi
articles.summary: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said on X on Tuesday, Oct. 15, that the company initially made ChatGPT restrictive to make sure it was being careful with mental health issues. Now that they have been able to mitigate the issues and have new tools, they are going to be able to relax the restrictions in most cases. In a few weeks, OpenAI plans to release a new version of ChatG PT that allows people to have a personality that behaves more like what people liked about 4o. In December, the company will roll out age-gating more fully and allow erotica for verified adults.

articles.title: Matters.AI Announces $6.25 Million Funding to Launch the First AI Security Engineer That Keeps Enterprise Data Security on Autopilot
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Matter.AI's autonomous system functions like an AI security engineer, understanding context, monitoring behavior, and protecting sensitive data. Matters.AI announced $6.25 million in funding to pioneer a new class of data protection system. The raise will fuel research and development in predictive defense, a US expansion, and scaling engineering to meet enterprise demand.

articles.title: Concerns about AI-written police reports spur states to regulate the emerging practice
articles.author: Andrew Guthrie Ferguson
articles.summary: On October 10, California became the second state to require transparent notice that AI was used to draft a police report. The law requires law enforcement agencies to maintain an audit trail that identifies the person who used AI to create a report and any video and audio footage used in creating the report.

articles.title: McAfee's Scam Detector Wins ‘Best Use of AI in Cybersecurity' at the 2025 A.I. Awards
articles.summary: McAfee's Scam Detector has been named Best Use of AI in Cybersecurity at the 2025 A.I. Awards for its groundbreaking use of artificial intelligence to detect and prevent online scams and deepfakes. One in three Americans have fallen victim to scams and lost an average of $1,500 each.

articles.title: 4 New AI Jobs That Pay Up To $200,000+ In 2026
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: These four AI jobs are the jobs of the future and hiring has already begun. Discover what these AI careers are, average salaries and example job postings hiring now to learn more about these AI jobs and their salaries. Find out what these jobs are and how much they pay.

articles.title: Tanium Ushers in New Era of Autonomous Endpoint Management Powered by Agentic AI and Real-time Intelligence
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Tanium announced Tanium Ask Agent, its first agentic AI experience designed to handle intelligent QA, provide insights and execute endpoint changes from a simple prompt. Tanium is a leader in Autonomous Endpoint Management (AEM) and is designed for endpoints.

articles.title: AI in Packaging Market Worth USD 6.47 Bn by 2034
articles.author: Precedence Research
articles.summary: The global AI in packaging market is expected to grow from USD 2.98 billion in 2026 to approximately USD 6.47 billion by 2034, with a CAGR of 10.28% from 2025 to 2034. The market growth is driven by increasing demand for intelligent, personalized packaging solutions and a growing focus on sustainability across the packaging value chain. The report was published by Towards Packaging, a sister firm of Precedence Research.

articles.title: Ryan Reynolds Tracks Down a Real Human Named Tilly Norwood (Not the AI Actress) to Star in Ad for Mint Mobile's Home Internet Service
articles.author: Todd Spangler
articles.summary: Ryan Reynolds is promoting a new wireless home internet service for $30/month for the first three months. The service is offered by Mint Mobile, which Reynolds sold to T-Mobile in 2023. Natalie 'Tilly' Norwood, a Mint Mobile customer, plays herself in the ad.

articles.title: Azul and Cast AI Partner to Optimize Java Workloads for Performance and Cloud Costs
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Azul and Cast AI announce a strategic partnership to help organizations improve Java runtime performance and reduce the footprint of cloud compute resources. Azul is the only company 100% focused on Java. Cast AI is the leading Application Performance Automation platform. It helps organizations cut cloud spend.

articles.title: The Next Era of Cybersecurity Demands Smarter, AI-Driven Identity Control, says Delinea's CEO
articles.author: Tahawultech
articles.summary: Art Gilliland, Chief Executive Officer of Delinea, talks about AI and its impact on business and security at GITEX 2025. He believes that identity is one of the most critical areas where AI can be captured, controlled and managed within an organization.

articles.title: Programming robots with rubber bands
articles.author: Anne J. Manning
articles.summary: Researchers in the Harvard John A. Paulson School of Engineering and Applied Sciences developed a simple robot with intelligence programmed into its mechanical structure. The demonstration could spark new inquiry into the fundamentals of robotic design and lead to smaller, simpler robots that can perform a variety of functions.

articles.title: Scouting America introduces new merit badges in AI and Cybersecurity
articles.author: Wbiw News
articles.summary: Scouting America has launched two new merit badges focused on cutting-edge technology: Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Cybersecurity. The badges have been available for about a week and some scouts have already earned them. Brothers Charles, 13, and Wydell Hendricks, 15, are among the first to complete them.

articles.title: Ryan Reynolds Teams up With Real Tilly Norwood– Not the AI One
articles.author: NBC
articles.summary: Ryan Reynolds has teamed up with Natalie 'Tilly' Norwood to launch his Mint Mobile home internet campaign. Tilly Norwood plays AI actor Tilly as well as a real woman named Natalie Norwood in the campaign.    Solve the daily Crossword.

articles.title: AITX Quarterly Report Filed, Revenue & Gross Profit Up Approximately 50%, Debt Down over $7 Million Versus Prior Year First Six Months
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: Artificial Intelligence Technology Solutions, Inc., (OTCID: AITX) announced its financial results for the second quarter of fiscal year 2026 (Q2 FY 2026), as reported in its 10-Q filing for the period ended August 31, 2025. The Company achieved profitability for the quarter, reporting a net profit of approximately $765,000. Revenues for the six-month period rose 53% to $3,743,586. Cash used in operating activities improved by $1,033,352.

articles.title: Judge Put Alabama Attorney On Blast, Accusing Him Of Using Fake AI-Generated Citations
articles.author: Anthony Yates
articles.summary: A judge reprimanded James A. Johnson for using fake AI-generated citations in court and fined him $5,000. His client kicked him off the case and sought a new lawyer. The lawyer used a Microsoft Word plug-in called Ghostwriter Legal. He apologized at the time and said he didn't know AI could generate fake cases.

articles.title: MediaScience Launches MediaPET.ai, the First AI Video Platform to Deliver Ad Impact on Par with Premium National Ads
articles.author: Media Science
articles.summary: MediaScience launched MediaPET.ai, the first AI-driven platform with demonstrated capacity to deliver advertising impact on par with premium video ads at a fraction of the cost. Premium ads recreated in MediaPET delivered statistically equivalent ad impact to the original campaigns with 98% of their perceived quality.

articles.title: New AI-driven tech can help your hearing loss, but will Medicare cover it?
articles.author: Sun Sentinel
articles.summary: Joanne Rosen's artificial intelligence in her hearing aid listens to sounds and makes adjustments so she can better hear the people at the table. This type of technology in AI-assisted hearing aids uses data to self-adjust and help the wearer focus on relevant conversations while in a noisy restaurant.

articles.title: Alkemi Launches DataLab to Empower Every Employee with AI-Powered Business Decision Intelligence
articles.author: Alkemi
articles.summary: Alkemi announced the launch of DataLab, a first-of-its-kind AI workspace. DataLab transforms complex business data into instant, transparent answers without relying on technical knowledge, analysts or risky uploads to public AI tools. Users get insights for questions like:

articles.title: The three jobs AI can't replace, according to Bill Gates
articles.author: Asger Risom
articles.summary: Bill Gates believes that while AI will transform many industries, some careers will remain out of reach for machines. In a recent blog post, he revealed the three fields he believes will stay human-led for years to come: finance, law, and business.

articles.title: AI-Developed Turkish Life Satisfaction Scale Validated
articles.summary: Researchers have created a Turkish life satisfaction scale using advanced AI methodologies. It leverages the computational power of artificial intelligence to construct a nuanced psychological instrument. It rigorously examines the validity and reliability of the scale.    It is heralding a new era in the field of psychological assessment.

articles.title: 32,000+ certified experts: Oracle launches AI Agent Marketplace for Fusion Apps with OpenAI, Google, Meta LLM support
articles.summary: Oracle expands AI Agent Studio with a new AI Agent Marketplace and 32,000+ certified experts. It adds support for OpenAI, Anthropic, Cohere, Google, Meta and xAI. It features MCP integrations, observability, RAG and token usage controls.

articles.title: Oracle Advances Enterprise AI with New Agents Across Fusion Applications
articles.author: Oracle
articles.summary: New AI agents embedded in Oracle Fusion Cloud Applications drive smarter decision-making across finance, HR, supply chain, sales, marketing and service. Built using Oracle AI Agent Studio for Fusion Applications and powered by industry-leading LLMs, the new AI agents help business leaders transform core finance functions, optimize HR processes, enhance end-to-end supply chain performance and unlock new revenue opportunities.

articles.title: Workday to create 200 jobs in new Dublin AI hub
articles.author: The Irish Times
articles.summary: Workday plans to invest €175 million to establish a new artificial intelligence 'centre of excellence' in Dublin. The company will create 200 jobs over three years. The IDA Ireland-supported investment expands the role of Workday's regional AI, cybersecurity, engineering and research expertise.

articles.title: Clever AI Humanizer Launches as Free AI Humanizer With No Online Ads or Paywalls
articles.summary: CleverFiles launches Clever AI Humanizer, a free tool that can humanize AI text into natural, human-sounding writing without ads or paywalls. The entire process takes just three steps: paste text, click humanize, and get results that are indistinguishable from real human writing. The interface is available in 20 languages.

articles.title: Clever AI Humanizer Launches as Free AI Humanizer With No Online Ads or Paywalls
articles.author: Clever Files
articles.summary: CleverFiles launches Clever AI Humanizer, a free tool that can humanize AI text into natural, human-sounding writing. It accurately detects and removes the language patterns AI detectors are trained to flag and it does so without any ads or paywalls. The entire process takes just three steps: paste your text, click humanize, and get results that are indistinguishable from real human writing.

articles.title: Clever AI Humanizer Launches as Free AI Humanizer With No Online Ads or Paywalls
articles.author: Clever Files
articles.summary: CleverFiles launches Clever AI Humanizer, a free tool that can humanize AI text into natural, human-sounding writing. It accurately detects and removes the language patterns AI detectors are trained to flag and it does so without any ads or paywalls.

articles.title: Oracle Helps Organizations Optimize the Candidate and Hiring Experience with Agentic AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: New AI-powered capabilities in Oracle Fusion Cloud Recruiting deliver a more personalized candidate experience, surfacing better quality applicants and smarter job matching. Oracle Career Coach leverages agentic AI in Oracle Cloud HCM to analyze the backgrounds, skills, and interests of internal and external candidates to surface better job matches, boost applicant quality and give hiring teams more comprehensive talent insights.

articles.title: For second time, Gov. Polis convenes group to rewrite Colorado's AI regulations
articles.author: Seth Klamann
articles.summary: The working group created by Gov. Jared Polis will try to reach a consensus on regulating artificial intelligence in Colorado. It will include 18 members from three broad groups: developers of AI technology, agencies and companies that use AI, and labor and advocacy groups that have generally pushed for tighter AI oversight. They will meet for the first time on Thursday.

articles.title: She looks real. She acts human. But Tilly Norwood isn't either, and she has Hollywood on edge.
articles.author: Taryn Ryder
articles.summary: Tilly Norwood is the first artificial intelligence actress created entirely by AI. Her debut at the Zurich Film Festival's industry summit set off a firestorm. Some actors are speaking out against her. The industry is already on edge when it comes to AI, and Norwood has only exacerbated its anxieties.

articles.title: Bay Area teen working to promote AI safety education for children
articles.author: Amanda
articles.summary: Governor Gavin Newsom signed a number of bills into law establishing guardrails for how Artificial Intelligence can interact with children and vulnerable individuals. He vetoed Assembly Bill 1064 that would limit children from using most companion chatbots. Kaashvi Mittal, 17, studied AI at Stanford and founded an organization called Together We AI to make AI education accessible to everyone.
